name: Wizardry 6: Bane of the Cosmic Forge

write_file.content:
[sdl]
sensitivity=20
fullresolution=desktop
windowresolution=original
fullscreen=true
output=opengl
[render]
aspect=true
scaler=normal2x

[autoexec]
mount C "$GAMEDIR/HDD" -t dir
C:
cd wizardry
wroot.exe
exit

content:
files:
- game: N/A:Select GOG installer.
- inno: https://lutris.nyc3.digitaloceanspaces.com/tools/innoextract/innoextract-1.8-dev-2019-01-13-linux.tar.xz
game:
  main_file: $GAMEDIR/wizardry.conf
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE
    file: $inno
- execute:
    args: -d "$CACHE" "$game"
    file: $CACHE/innoextract
- write_file:
    content: '#!/bin/bash

      src=$1

      dst=$2

      find "$src" -type f \( -name "*.DRV" -o -name "*.PIC" -o -name "*.HDR" -o -name
      "*.CGA" -o -name "*.EGA" -o -name "*.T16" -o -name "*.DBS" -o -name "*.SND"
      -o -name "*.OVR" -o -name "*.EXE" -o -name "Wizardy 6 - Manual.pdf" \) -exec
      cp {} "$dst" \;'
    file: $CACHE/selectcopy.sh
- chmodx: $CACHE/selectcopy.sh
- execute:
    args: $GAMEDIR/HDD $GAMEDIR/HDD/wizardry
    file: mkdir
- execute:
    args: $CACHE/app $GAMEDIR/HDD/wizardry
    file: $CACHE/selectcopy.sh
- write_file:
    content: '[sdl]

      sensitivity=20

      fullresolution=desktop

      windowresolution=original

      fullscreen=true

      output=opengl

      [render]

      aspect=true

      scaler=normal2x


      [autoexec]

      mount C "$GAMEDIR/HDD" -t dir

      C:

      cd wizardry

      wroot.exe

      exit'
    file: $GAMEDIR/wizardry.conf
